peril.concurrent

Class ProcessTransfer

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.concurrent.ProcessTransfer

  • public final class ProcessTransfer
extends java.lang.Object
    A thread safe queue that allows Actions to be passed from thread to thread. This object uses the singleton pattern and is accessible via getInstane().
    Since:
    2018-02-06
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    LinkedTransferQueue

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Queue<Action<?>> buffer
      This Queue holds instructions stored as objects for the background thread to execute.
      private static ProcessTransfer INSTANCE
      The singleton instance of ProcessTransfer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private ProcessTransfer()
      Constructs the single ProcessTransfer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ProcessTransfer getInstane()
      Retrieve the singleton instance of ProcessTransfer.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Retrieves if the ProcessTransfer Queue is empty.
      void poll()
      Executes the first Action in the Queue of actions to be executed.
      void transfer(Action<?> action)
      Adds a Action to the ProcessTransfer Queue.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        private static final ProcessTransfer INSTANCE
        The singleton instance of ProcessTransfer.

      • buffer

        private final java.util.Queue<Action<?>> buffer
        This Queue holds instructions stored as objects for the background thread to execute. This allows for an asynchronous execution resulting is a responsive user interface.
        See Also:
        Queue, LinkedTransferQueue

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProcessTransfer

        private ProcessTransfer()
        Constructs the single ProcessTransfer.

    • Method Detail

      • poll

        public void poll()
        Executes the first Action in the Queue of actions to be executed. This removes the Action from the Queue.

      • transfer

        public void transfer(Action<?> action)
        Adds a Action to the ProcessTransfer Queue. This Action will only be executed when a thread calls poll().
        Parameters:
        action - Action to perform.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Retrieves if the ProcessTransfer Queue is empty.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • getInstane

        public static ProcessTransfer getInstane()
        Retrieve the singleton instance of ProcessTransfer.
        Returns:
        ProcessTransfer
